alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Juneau, northeastern Vernon, Adams and eastern Monroe Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 430 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Wisconsin Dells and Tomah, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Juneau, northeastern Vernon, Adams and eastern Monroe Counties, including the following locations... New Miner, Johnson Hill, Big Spring, Glendale, Trippville, Lemonweir, Pleasant Ridge and The Rezin Landing Strip. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 136 and 147. Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 46 and 86. Interstate 90 in Wisconsin between mile markers 32 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
